ourStory.title: It all begins with us.
ourStory.paragraph: What began as a chance meeting turned into a love that crossed oceans. Our relationship has lived in two time zones, two countries, and countless text messages and long flights. Through all the challenges of being apart, we discovered a love that is steady, strong, and worth every mile. As we continue building our future together, we feel so grateful to share this moment, and this chapter of our story, with all of you.
